{{Description|"Since childhood, Lan Yan has always enjoyed wandering the mountains and forests, humming tunes and playing with the local wildlife."|2=[[Dainsleif]] in [https://youtu.be/6syttY8u6uc Collected Miscellany - "Lan Yan: Ink-Feather Formation"]}}
'''Thought and Intent, Like Silken Scent''' is [[Lan Yan]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When a character interacts with any Wildlife, nearby Crystalflies and Loaches will become [[startle]]d and start to flee, while other types of Wildlife will not become startled. Crabs may still flee under certain conditions, such as if they are near other wildlife that is startled, like birds.
* {{Talent Note|character=Lan Yan|talent=Thought and Intent, Like Silken Scent|alive}}
